text: Today on the West Coast, it's a tough call with 7 ft @12s W swell but fresh 24 mph SSW winds making it blown out. Tomorrow, conditions worsen with similar swell but stronger 29 mph SSW winds, keeping it messy. By the day after, the swell drops to 4 ft @9s WSW with 32 mph ESE winds, still not ideal. Best: today.
